item.title: UK Porn Age Checks Raise Privacy Concerns
item.description: UK Porn Age Checks Raise Privacy Concerns Source: BBC News - Link to Article The UK government is introducing new internet safety laws aimed at protecting children online, but concerns about privacy have been raised. According to the proposed Online Safety Bill, platforms that publish or allow pornographic content will be required to implement age verification measures. However, digital rights groups are questioning the transparency and data collection methods associated with these tools.
